## Description

- The .qmd file contains the R codes used to produce the quantitative analyses in the paper, including the statistical figures. This .qmd file also contains some narrative interweaved with the codes. The .qmd is published as a webpage at: https://gederajeg.github.io/applicative-buy/

- The raw, annotated concordance data is located in [`data`](https://github.com/gederajeg/applicative-buy/tree/main/data)

- The statistical figures can also be accessed individually [here](https://github.com/gederajeg/applicative-buy/tree/main/nusa-applicative-code_files/figure-html)
